commit.message:
alias.c (find_base_value, [...]): Handle #ifdef POINTERS_EXTEND_UNSIGNED.

	* alias.c (find_base_value, case ZERO_EXTEND, case SIGN_EXTEND):
	Handle #ifdef POINTERS_EXTEND_UNSIGNED.
